get.summary: Find an element by his ids
find all element that respect the criteria

parameters.name: domainId
parameters.description: Is the domain id where  the search is applyed

parameters.name: anchorId
parameters.description: Is the id of an entry from where start the search

parameters.name: contextSize
parameters.description: Include this number of entries before the startDate (used for highlighting entries)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number the number of entries after the start date.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Only include entries that use one of these tags

parameters.name: requireAllTags
parameters.description: Require that all entries found includes all the tags

get.summary: Return all the implementation history of an inventory element

post.summary: Create a new implementations for an inventory element

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by filtering on cass name that contains the input string

get.summary:
find the element path given an element id. The path can be requested to be:
- upward(from the element to the leaf)
- downward(from the element to the root)
- full (give the full path to the root to leaf that contains the element)

parameters.name: domainId
parameters.description: Is the domain id where that own the element

parameters.name: elementId
parameters.description: Is the element id where to start the the path

parameters.name: pathType
parameters.description: If is the type of the path to return

get.summary: Find the child of a given element id that is the parent
Return all history for the element attributes

parameters.name: domainId
parameters.description: The domain id that own the element

parameters.name: elementId
parameters.description: The element id that own the attribute

parameters.name: resolveInheritance
parameters.description: Resolve the inheritance filling filed from the extended class

get.summary: Example api that realize an ECHO

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Is the value that will be returned in post operation

schema.description: Is the value that will be returned in post operation

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: is the prefix used to filter the people

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: is the prefix used to filter the groups

parameters.description: Is the unique eid of the authentication token
